Class Reading

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.media.MediaPlayer.OnBufferingUpdateListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener

    public class Reading
extends AudioPlayer
    The FSM driving the map related updates for a sound playback.
